instance_template: truck(t1). package(p1). location(l1;l2). fuelcost(5,l1,l2). fuel(t1,10,0). at(p1,l1,0). at(t1,l1,0). goal(p1,l2). step(1..10).
generator:
{ occurs(load(P,T,L), S) : package(P), truck(T), location(L); occurs(unload(P,T,L), S) : package(P), truck(T), location(L); occurs(drive(T,L1,L2), S) : truck(T), fuelcost(C,L1,L2) } <= 1 :- step(S).

at(T, L2, S) :- occurs(drive(T,L1,L2), S).
at(T, L, S) :- at(T, L, S-1), not moved_truck(T, S), step(S).
moved_truck(T, S) :- occurs(drive(T,L1,L2), S).

at(P, L, S) :- occurs(unload(P, T, L), S).
at(P, L, S) :- at(P, L, S-1), not moved_package(P, S), step(S).
moved_package(P, S) :- occurs(load(P, T, L), S).

in(P, T, S) :- occurs(load(P, T, L), S).
in(P, T, S) :- in(P, T, S-1), not dropped_package(P, S), step(S).
dropped_package(P, S) :- occurs(unload(P, T, L), S).

fuel(T, F-C, S) :- occurs(drive(T, L1, L2), S), fuel(T, F, S-1), fuelcost(C, L1, L2).
fuel(T, F, S) :- fuel(T, F, S-1), not moved_truck(T, S), step(S).

hard_constraints.description: sanity check: can't just skip time steps in our plan.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- occurs(A, S), not occurs(_, S-1), S > 1.

hard_constraints.description: check if the truck actually has enough gas before it starts zooming around.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- occurs(drive(T, L1, L2), S), fuel(T, F, S-1), fuelcost(C, L1, L2), F < C.

hard_constraints.description: make sure the truck is actually at the starting line before it tries to drive.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- occurs(drive(T, L1, L2), S), not at(T, L1, S-1).

hard_constraints.description: can't pick up a package if it's not even at the location.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- occurs(load(P, T, L), S), not at(P, L, S-1).

hard_constraints.description: the truck's gotta be there too if it wants to grab the goods.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- occurs(load(P, T, L), S), not at(T, L, S-1).

hard_constraints.description: truck needs to be at the destination to drop things off.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- occurs(unload(P, T, L), S), not at(T, L, S-1).

hard_constraints.description: can't drop a package if it's not actually inside the truck.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- occurs(unload(P, T, L), S), not in(P, T, S-1).

hard_constraints.description: did we get everything where it needs to go? simple check at the end.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- goal(P, L), M = #max { S : step(S) }, not at(P, L, M).
